mapper.insert:
SELECT sys_guid() FROM dual
INSERT INTO S_VERCORD( vercodeid, userlogid, optype, mobile, vercode, createdate, enddate, aae100, verresult ) VALUES ( #{vercodeid}, #{userlogid}, #{optype}, #{mobile}, #{vercode}, #{createdate}, #{enddate}, #{aae100}, #{verresult} )
mapper.delete: update s_vercord set aae100='0' where mobile=#{mobile} and optype=#{optype} and aae100='1'
mapper.select: SELECT vercodeid, userlogid, optype, mobile, vercode, createdate, enddate, aae100, inputcode, inputtime, verresult FROM s_vercord WHERE mobile=#{mobile} and optype=#{optype} and aae100='1' ORDER BY createdate desc
mapper.update: UPDATE s_vercord SET aae100=#{aae100}, inputcode=#{inputcode}, inputtime=#{inputtime}, verresult=#{verresult} WHERE vercodeid=#{vercodeid}
